description: Vector calculus, arclength, line integrals, applications. Calculus of 2 & 3 variables: partial derivatives, conservative fields, Taylor series, maxima & minima, non-linear equations. 1st order & linear 2nd order differential equations (constant coefficients). Applications (dynamical systems etc), numerical methods.
restricted:
GCSc, GCEdSt, GDipEdSt, MEdSt. 
Permission from the Head of School is required to enrol in this course.
